<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>change_request</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>true</execute_function><filter_condition/><message/><name>Count Change Tasks by Assignee</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[function onDisplay(current, g_scratchpad) {
	//This function will be automatically called when this rule is processed.
	
	var changeTaskAssignees = [current.assigned_to + ""];
	var changeTasks = new GlideRecord("change_task");
	changeTasks.addQuery("change_request", current.sys_id);
	changeTasks.query();
	
	while(changeTasks.next()) {
		changeTaskAssignees.push(changeTasks.assigned_to);
	}
	
	var otherTasksForUser = new GlideAggregate("change_task");
	otherTasksForUser.addQuery("assigned_to", changeTaskAssignees);
	otherTasksForUser.groupBy("assigned_to");
	otherTasksForUser.addAggregate("COUNT");
	otherTasksForUser.query();
	
	while(otherTasksForUser.next()) {
		gs.addInfoMessage(otherTasksForUser.getDisplayValue("assigned_to") + " has " + otherTasksForUser.getAggregate("COUNT") + " Change Tasks assigned.")
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-03-25 21:00:54</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>d3d6fb41250331007f44deef22086e99</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Count Change Tasks by Assignee</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_d3d6fb41250331007f44deef22086e99</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-03-26 08:55:40</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before_display</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=d3d6fb41250331007f44deef22086e99"/></record_update>
